name: Dial H for Heartache
description:
Dial H for Heartache is a game about love, payphones, storms, and fighting to be together. 

It's a not-so-endless runner where you’ll be dodging obstacles and using payphones to keep the connection of hearts strong, but beware, the storm gets stronger each time you use the phone.

Made for LÖVE Jam 2023. https://itch.io/jam/love2d-jam-2023, version 11.4

Controls Left arrow: Move forward Right arrow: Move backward Mouse click: Navigate payphone screens If you want to try again, quit and restart the game. Credits

Developed by: allieflx https://allieflx.itch.io/

Art: sugar0bagel https://sugar0bagel.itch.io/

Additional assets: allieflx

Non-jam audio assets:

'payphone sounds' by 'everythingsounds'; https://freesound.org/people/everythingsounds/sounds/197141/ 

'rain falls against parasol' by 'straget'; https://freesound.org/people/straget/sounds/531947/ 

'thunder' by 'straget'; https://freesound.org/people/straget/sounds/527664/

'thunder clap' by 'dave welsh'; https://freesound.org/people/Dave%20Welsh/sounds/194364/ 

'running' by 'juandamb'; https://freesound.org/people/Juandamb/sounds/430708/

'heavy rain'; https://www.chosic.com/download-audio/28301/

All other assets were created during the jam.
